casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Eric Lamontee BECK, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 152934
COA: 321806 Supreme Court of Michigan. August 15, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motions of the Criminal Defense Attorneys of Michigan to extend the time for filing a brief amicus curiae and to waive the filing fee are GRANTED. The amicus brief will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before September 24, 2018. On further order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellant to extend the time for filing his supplemental reply brief to August 27, 2018, is GRANTED.
